title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 831.7 - Verbatim record
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 831.7 - Verbatim record

State Regulations
(a) A verbatim
record of the hearing shall be made by whatever means the Office deems
appropriate. (b) A transcription of
the hearing shall be made available to any party requesting it upon payment of
the cost of transcription by the requesting party. If more than one party
requests the transcript, the cost will be allocated among the
parties. (c) The Office may waive
the transcript cost upon a showing of hardship by the requesting party. Requests for transcripts and for waiver of transcript costs must be made in
writing to the Commissioner and must be submitted no later than the first day
of the hearing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14

New

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
